Take the information below and generate and agent instructions .md file for it in the /docs directory. If a .md filename is provided, use that, otherwise generate an appropriate filename based on the generated content. Make sure the instructions are clear and concise and not too lengthy. Make sure to update AGENTS.md file to reference this new docs file. If now information is provided below, prompt the user to give the necessary details about the layer of the archeticture or conding standards to be documented.
